summary: A world citizen specialised in hydrology and quantitative water management. I am passionate about helping people optimally use the water resources available to them by increasing understanding of the hydrogeology of an area and analysing how to manage water more efficiently and sustainably. I thoroughly enjoy finding culture-conscious solutions to physical world issues.

projects: [{'title': 'Improving a small-scale water system in Kerala, India', 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'description': 'Via NGO Stichting Staal, 3 students and I were approached as academic experts to improve the water system for a school and orphanage in rural Southern-India. This school currently depends solely on a open dug well to meet all their needs, but in 2015 and 2016, the area experienced a drought. The well water could not meet their needs and this forced the school to decrease water use for 3 months each year and buy water when the supply got too low. Our team is analysing how to make the water system more sustainable by reducing runoff and harvesting rainwater. In July we will travel as a team to the school and orphanage to share our ideas and implement the solutions. ', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Monique', 'last_name': 'Spruijt', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Hydrologist/Policy advisor at Waterschap Noorderzijlvest'}]}, {'title': '4K Mapping (University of the Nations) - Philippines', 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'description': 'The 4K Mapping group aims to provide up to date information about countries/cities that different campuses of the university ask for. The purpose is to understand how populations are distributed in these places so that effective missions work can be carried out. In this project we are making a map of the Philippines that contains the names of all the islands and their populations. ', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Monique', 'last_name': 'Spruijt', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Hydrologist/Policy advisor at Waterschap Noorderzijlvest'}]}]
